[1]: https://rosettacode.org/wiki/Iccanobif_primes

# [Iccanobif primes][1]

```perl
sub abbr ($_) { (.chars < 41 ?? $_ !! .substr(0,20) ~ '..' ~ .substr(*-20)) ~ " (digits: {.chars})" }

say (++$).fmt('%2d') ~ ': ' ~ .flip.&abbr for (lazy (1,1,*+*…*).hyper.grep: {.flip.is-prime})[^25];
```

#### Output:
```

 2: 3 (digits: 1)
 3: 5 (digits: 1)
 4: 31 (digits: 2)
 5: 43 (digits: 2)

 7: 7951 (digits: 4)

10: 393121 (digits: 6)
```
